ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- cos7
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '12'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
gmp:
- '6'
graphviz:
- '12'
libboost_devel:
- '1.84'
libboost_python_devel:
- '1.84'
mpfr:
- '4'
pin_run_as_build:
  graphviz:
    max_pin: x
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_stdlib_version
  - cdt_name

about.description:
Ledger is a powerful, double-entry accounting system that is accessed from the
UNIX command-line. Ledger, begun in 2003, is written by John Wiegley and
released under the BSD license. It has also inspired several ports to other
languages.
about.summary: Double-entry accounting system with a command-line reporting interface

about.description:
Ledger is a powerful, double-entry accounting system that is accessed from the
UNIX command-line. Ledger, begun in 2003, is written by John Wiegley and
released under the BSD license. It has also inspired several ports to other
languages.
about.summary: Double-entry accounting system with a command-line reporting interface

name: ledger
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ledger" %}
{% set version = "3.3.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "555296ee1e870ff04e2356676977dcf55ebab5ad79126667bc56464cb1142035" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/ledger/ledger/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 5
  skip: true  # [win or osx or py<38]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage("ledger") }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - cmake
    - make
  host:
    - libboost-python-devel
    - libboost-devel
    - gmp
    - mpfr
    - utfcpp
    - gettext # optional
    - libedit # optional
    - python # optional
    - doxygen # docs
    - graphviz # docs
    - texinfo # docs
  run:
    - gmp
    - mpfr
    - utfcpp
    - gettext # optional
    - libedit # optional
    - python # optional

test:
  commands:
    - ledger | grep {{ version }}

about:
  home: https://www.ledger-cli.org/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: Double-entry accounting system with a command-line reporting interface
  description: |
    Ledger is a powerful, double-entry accounting system that is accessed from the
    UNIX command-line. Ledger, begun in 2003, is written by John Wiegley and
    released under the BSD license. It has also inspired several ports to other
    languages.
  doc_url: https://www.ledger-cli.org/docs.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/ledger/ledger

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thatisapseudo
